text: Vytorin is a clinical drug made up of chemicals called ezetimibe (right image) and simvastatin (Left image) to help people with diseases that change the amount of fats in the blood. ==Other websites== *http://www.vytorin.com/vytorin/shared/documents/vytorin_pi.pdf * http://blogs.wsj.com/health/2008/09/02/new-england-journal-of-medicine- vytorin-cancer-link-uncertain/ * http://content.nejm.org/cgi/content/abstract/NEJMsa0806603v1 Category:Drugs
title: Vytorin
